name: codex-swarm
description: Pipeline launcher for Codex CLI with staged agent networks

scripts.smoke: npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const os=require('os');const path=require('path');const {execFileSync}=require('child_process');const tmp=fs.mkdtempSync(path.join(os.tmpdir(),'codex-swarm-'));const pipelines=path.join(tmp,'.codex-swarm','pipelines');fs.mkdirSync(pipelines,{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync('tests/pipelines/command-json.yaml', path.join(pipelines,'command-json.yaml'));const bin=path.resolve('dist/index.js');execFileSync(process.execPath,[bin,'command-json'],{cwd:tmp,stdio:'inherit'});"
